name: Dark Tower (CP Verlag)
overview: You are trapped inside the dark tower and must find a way to escape. Published in Magic Disk 64 1988/02. Dark Tower is a text adventure with an excellent parser. This means that the computer also understands whole sentences, such as B. ' TAKE THE BIG SWORD 'ETC. We don't want to say anything about the solution to this adventure at this point, because we don't want to take the tension off you. We therefore wish you a lot of fun puzzling!
